# Legacy to Skills Migration Map

## Agents

- `design-analyzer.agent.md` -> `vscode-extension-orchestrator` (design intake + routing)
- `extension-architect.agent.md` -> `vscode-extension-orchestrator` (architecture decisions)
- `ui-pattern-specialist.agent.md` -> `vscode-extension-implementation`
- `custom-editor-specialist.agent.md` -> `vscode-extension-implementation`
- `webview-developer.agent.md` -> `vscode-webview-elements`
- `extension-tester.agent.md` -> `vscode-extension-qa-packaging`
- `packaging-specialist.agent.md` -> `vscode-extension-qa-packaging`

## Prompt

- `develop-vscode-extension.prompt.md` -> `vscode-extension-orchestrator`

## Instructions

Move these into skill references:
- `extension-development-best-practices.instructions.md`
- `ui-component-selection-standards.instructions.md`
- `vscode-elements-integration.instructions.md`

## Recommended Phases

1. Add skills and update docs.
2. Mark legacy files deprecated.
3. Remove legacy files after one successful end-to-end run.
